titles: The Latine grammar. Or, A guide teaching a compendious way to attaine exact skill in the Latine tongue for a proper congruity and elegant variety of phrases in prose and verse. Published for the common good in continuation of a former guide, teaching to read English rightly, and write accordingly. By Richard Lloyd.
author: Lloyd, Richard, 1594 or 5-1659.
publisher: printed by Thomas Roycroft, for the author,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Latin language --  Study and teaching --  Early works to 1800.
Latin language --  Syntax --  Early works to 1800.
